nDescription: Facing : North <nline> There is nothing here
eDescription: Facing : East <nline> You look back into the bedroom.
sDescription: Facing : South <nline> There is nothing here.
wDescription: Facing : West <nline> You open the box, to reveal a complicated power system. <nline> Thankfully, by the power of games, you know how to work it, and manage to turn the power on <nline> [THE POWER TO THE ELEVATOR HAS BEEN TURNED ON]  <nline> Behind you is the bedroom.
